org.eclipse.viatra.query.tooling.core.project

Class PluginXmlModifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.viatra.query.tooling.core.project.PluginXmlModifier

  • public class PluginXmlModifier
extends java.lang.Object
    Stateful helper class for updating the extension definitions in a plugin.xml file of a PDE plug-in project.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PluginXmlModifier() 

    • Method Summary

      Loads the plugin.xml file from the selected project.

      Removes a collection of extensions from the current xml model.
      void savePluginXml()
      Saves the changes to the plugin.xml file loaded previously.

    • Method Detail

      • loadPluginXml

        public void loadPluginXml(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject project)
                   throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
        Loads the plugin.xml file from the selected project. The project is assumed to be a PDE plug-in project for this to work.
        Parameters:
        project -
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException

      • savePluginXml

        public void savePluginXml()
                   throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
        Saves the changes to the plugin.xml file loaded previously.
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException

      • addExtensions

        public void addExtensions(java.lang.Iterable<ExtensionData> contributedExtensions)
        Adds a collection of extensions to the current xml model. If previous extensions with the same name are already available, it updates them instead.

      • removeExtensions

        public void removeExtensions(java.lang.Iterable<org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.lib.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> removedExtensions)
        Removes a collection of extensions from the current xml model. The removed extensions are described as «id»-«extension point id» pairs. If multiple extensions are available with the same metadata, all of them are removed.
        Parameters:
        removedExtensions -
